name: Cube Zombie
description:
The year is 3001. You are a soldier assigned to a military base located on top of Mount Everest that researches and creates mutants. 

One day, you woke up to a loud noise and find the mutants have escaped. All the other people were already killed, so you must collect the data from the central computer and escape through the helicopter. 

Creators: Aydan See, Brandon Peng, Gerald Lu, Kenneth Albarillo

Thank you to our instructors, Mirek and Dani, for helping us along the way and being great mentors. Shoutout to the course assistants for teaching us and Cluster 5 for being the best cluster.
